description_for_human: Summarize documents and answer questions from PDFs, web pages or plain text directly within ChatGPT.
description_for_model: Use this plugin to read, summarise and answer questions about documents. Users can supply a URL, upload a PDF or text file, or provide raw text. When asked to summarise a document, call the `/summarize` endpoint with the provided content and desired length. When asked a question about a document, call the `/answer` endpoint with the question and the document.
